description: Name of the main crop produced by the household.

factor: Power and freedom to solve problems collectively
description: How far does the farmer agree with the statement: If I work together with others in my community, we have power and freedom to solve problems facing farmers.

factor: Satisfaction with quality of local environment
description: How satisfied is the farmer with the quality of their local environment?
How far does the farmer agree with the statement: I live in a place where most people take good care of the land and nature.
How would the farmer rate the stability of the household income over time?
How effective does the farmer perceive associations or organizations are in supporting business ventures?
Would local farmer cooperatives provide support to the household in case of need?
How far does the farmer agree with the statement: I care a lot about nature?
